title: Social Media Teaser
description: A one-minute teaser for your loved ones to see on Instagram / Facebook. Delivered one week after the wedding.

title: Engagement Session
description: Must be booked at least 2 months prior to Wedding Day. Additional payment of $300 if under 2 months of booking.
Projector and Screen will be provided by couple or the venue for presentation.

title: Additional Cinematographer
description: Do you need more angles for your film? An additional Cinematographer can get that for you.
